summary: As a Computer Science and Engineering undergraduate, I am passionate about building reliable, well-designed systems and exploring Artificial Intelligence. I enjoy solving real-world problems through clean architecture and scalable code, and I am eager to contribute to projects that deliver meaningful and useful software solutions.

education.institution: Department of Computer Science & Engineering, University of Moratuwa

projects.title: MatchCV
projects.description: This is a web-based system that matches job positions with individuals' CVs to help them find suitable opportunities. It uses Google GenAI to classify CVs into relevant fields. I am currently contributing to the development of parts of the Ballerina service, which serves as the main entry point in this microservice-based system.
projects.techstack: Ballerina, Node.js, FastAPI, MongoDB, Google GenAI, Veu

projects.title: Automatic MCQ Grader
projects.description: This is a web-based system that automatically grades MCQ bubble sheets and detects student index numbers. It uses image processing and OCR technologies, leveraging OpenCV and other text recognition models. I am developing the OCR microservice and the main backend service.

projects.title: NOC-Connect Web App
projects.description: This is a web-based system that enables sponsors to search for talented athletes and connect with them, targeting support for the National Olympic Committee of Sri Lanka. I developed the chatbot backend component using JavaScript.

projects.title: RPAL Language Interpreter
projects.description: This is a comprehensive command-line interpreter for the RPAL programming language(Right-reference Pedagogic Algorithmic Language), a functional programming language used primarily for teaching programming concepts. This interpreter parses RPAL programs through multiple stages. I contributed by developing the Parser and Abstract Syntax Tree components.

competitions_hackathons_events.title: Applied Data Science and Artificial Intelligence (ADSAI) Symposium 2025
competitions_hackathons_events.institution: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, University of Moratuwa

competitions_hackathons_events.title: Finalist - DevQuest, CODEFEST 2024
